mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, content, writer) values (#{bno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select * from board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt = viewcnt + 1 where bno = #{bno}
update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
